diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Renal amyloidosis derived from fibrinogen â€“ AFib
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Diagnosis was confirmed through kidney biopsy which showed Congo red positive deposits with apple-green birefringence under polarized light. This was supplemented by immunofluorescence studies that indicated positivity for fibrinogen and normal results for other amyloid types. Molecular studies identified a mutation in the fibrinogen A/H9251 chain.
